DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 , non-randomized , open label , noncomparative trial study effect intravitreal injection aflibercept eye symptomatic macular edema retinal artery macroaneurysms .
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Aflibercept Injection Symptomatic Macular Edema From Retinal Artery Macroaneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: Baseline evaluation consist measurement best-corrected ETDRS visual acuity , complete eye exam , include IOP measurement , color photo intravenous fluorescein angiography , spectral domain OCT vitals . Patients meet eligibility criterion treat intravitreal injection 2.0 mg aflibercept usual aseptic precaution . Follow visit Day 7 , 30 , 60 , 90 , 120 , 150 180 . At follow-up visit , best-corrected ETDRS visual acuity , IOP measurement central foveal thickness ( CFT ) SDOCT obtain . Color photo IVFA perform month 3 6 visit . Retreatment shall perform sooner two month previous injection one follow criterion 1 . CFT > 310 micron 2 . Intraretinal subretinal fluid SDOCT 3 . Increase CFT 50 micron low value observe intravitreal aflibercept injection 4 . Decrease vision 5 letter frpm previous visit associate OCT evidence macular edema . 5 . Appearance new hemorrhage color photograph . Final follow-up six month . Data collect include , change ETDRS visual acuity baseline , change CFT , number injection , number eye completely dry SDOCT , number eye thrombose RAM IVFA .
